ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: We poured water, pouring it in great abundance,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: That We watered it in abundance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: We pour forth water in abundance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: That We pour down the water, pouring (it) down in abundance,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: We poured out the rains abundantly,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: How We pour water in showers
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We let the rain pour down in torrents
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: It is We Who pour forth water, pouring,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: We pour down plenteous water [from the sky],
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: For that We pour forth water in abundance,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: That We pour forth water in abundance,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: how We pour down rain in abundance,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We pour down water in abundance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: How We poured down water in torrents,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [80:25] that We pour down water, from the clouds, plenteously;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Allah then explained these different states, saying: (How We pour water) i.e. rain (in showers) upon the earth
